Class OuterWallBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.ac.tuwien.mmue_lm7.game.level.builder.LevelPartBuilder

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LevelBaseBuilder

    public class OuterWallBuilder
extends LevelPartBuilder
    Builder for making a ring wall on edges of level Holes at vertical and horizontal side can be configured
    Author:
    simon
